import { useState } from "react"; function App() { const [currentQuestion, setCurrentQuestion] = useState(0); const questions = [ { question: "I am a first question", answers: ["answer 1", "answer 2", "answer 3", "answer 4"], trueAnswer: "answer 2", }, { question: "I am a second question", answers: ["answer 1", "answer 2", "answer 3", "answer 4"], trueAnswer: "answer 3", }, { question: "I am a third question", answers: ["answer 1", "answer 2", "answer 3", "answer 4"], trueAnswer: "answer 4", }, ]; return (

Quiz Progress

Track your quiz progress

{currentQuestion} /{questions.length}

You answered {currentQuestion} out of {questions.length} questions

Question: {currentQuestion + 1}

{questions[currentQuestion].question}

12
{questions[currentQuestion].answers.map((answer, index) => { return ( ); })}
You must choose an answer!
You must hurry up!
); } export default App;
